title: Why did the people of Pompeii die? Couldn't they just outrun the lava? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most of them were slow and fat from years of decadent living, and as such they could barely move. it was like a whole city filled with “my 600lb life” people that didn’t have electric scooters. Slaves would carry them around on litters so they wouldn’t have to walk. once the volcano blew, all the slaves (who were the only ones in good physical shape) ran off and left all the obese people to themselves. so, that’s why they died. It was like the people in the movie “WALL-E  ” where their bones had shrunk from disuse. The best they could do was just kind of roll around slowing and awkwardly. So, the lava just kind of rolled over them like pancake batter. That’s why they were all clustered up in weird positions. it’s a well known fact it was pretty disgusting.
